Articles.Content: I literally just bought the game today and have had nothing but issues with it. The most common crash happens after loading the game. Another crash happened when it said "Too many heap sections!" I have no idea what the problem is, and it's pretty annoying. Anyone have any possible solutions?

Please read this.

We especially need the log files.

Your computer specs? Especially OS and RAM.

The simplest explanation would be that you're running out of memory.

Edited October 12, 2014 by slumpie
